title: news feeds stop updating after uploading files
body:
i first posted this issue to the news app but was instructed to move it here.

### expected behaviour

feeds should continue to update via webcron job after a bunch of files are uploaded

### actual behaviour

feeds stop updating after a bunch of files are uploaded

### steps to reproduce
1. enable and populate the news app in a running oc5 install
2. wait a few days to confirm the feeds are updating
3. up load a bunch of files (about 2300 in my case)
4. wait 12 hours to confirm that the feeds stopped updating about an hour or two after the files started uploading

### server configuration

#### operating system: uname -a
linux .bluehost.com 2.6.32-20130307.60.9.bh6.x86_64 #1 smp thu mar 7 15:58:33 est 2013 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 gnu/linux

#### web server: apachectl -v
server version: apache/2.2.25 (unix)
server built: jul 11 2013 23:40:20

#### database: mysql --version
mysql ver 14.14 distrib 5.5.33, for linux (x86_64) using readline 5.1

#### php version: /usr/bin/php54s --version
php 5.4.17 (cgi-fcgi) (built: jul 12 2013 21:50:30)
copyright (c) 1997-2013 the php group
zend engine v2.4.0, copyright (c) 1998-2013 zend technologies
with zend guard loader v3.3, copyright (c) 1998-2013, by zend technologies

#### owncloud version: 'version' => '5.0.17',

### client configuration

#### browser: 
safari 6.0.5, ff 23.0.1, ff 23.0

#### operating system: 
mac os x 10.7.5, ubuntu 13.4

### logs

#### web server error log

xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx - - [28/aug/2013:05:30:05 -0600] "get /~000000/owncloud5/cron.php http/1.1" 200 4560 "-" "curl/7.29.0"
xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx - - [28/aug/2013:06:00:04 -0600] "get /~000000/owncloud5/cron.php http/1.1" 200 4560 "-" "curl/7.29.0"

#### web server log

[wed aug 28 13:30:30 2013] [error] [client xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx] which: no smbclient in (/bin:/usr/bin), referer: https://.bluehost.com/~000000/owncloud5/index.php/apps/news/
[wed aug 28 13:30:30 2013] [error] [client xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx] which: no smbclient in (/bin:/usr/bin), referer: https://.bluehost.com/~000000/owncloud5/index.php/apps/news/

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)

{"app":"search_lucene","message":"failed to extract meta information for \/mark\/files\/evernote\/google reader is shutting down; here are the best alternatives.resources: could not open \"\/home\/000000\/public_html\/owncloud5\/data\/mark\/files\/evernote\/google reader is shutting down; here are the best alternatives.resources\" (does not exist, or is not a file)","level":2,"time":"2013-08-28t17:30:03+00:00"}
{"app":"search_lucene","message":"failed to extract meta information for \/mark\/files\/evernote\/annotating -- im v6 examples_1.resources: could not open \"\/home\/0000000\/public_html\/owncloud5\/data\/mark\/files\/evernote\/annotating -- im v6 examples_1.resources\" (does not exist, or is not a file)","level":2,"time":"2013-08-28t18:30:04+00:00"}
